columns.Country_Id: The unique identifier for each country.
columns.Capital: The capital city of the country.
columns.Official_native_language: The main language spoken in the country.
columns.Regoin: The geographical region in which the country is located.

country.table_description: The table holds information about various countries.

columns.Team_ID: The unique identifier for each racing team.
columns.Team: The name of the racing team.
columns.Make: The vehicle make used by the team.
columns.Manager: The name of the team's manager.
columns.Sponsor: The company sponsoring the racing team.
columns.Car_Owner: The individual or entity that owns the car.

team.table_description: The table stores details of various car racing teams.

columns.Driver_ID: The unique identifier for each driver.
columns.Driver: The name of the racing driver.
columns.Country: The country of the driver, linked to the country table.
columns.Age: The age of the racing driver in years.
columns.Car_#: The number assigned to the driver's car.
columns.Make: The make of the vehicle used by the driver.
columns.Points: The accumulated points by the driver in competitions.
columns.Laps: The total laps completed by the driver in races.
columns.Winnings: The total monetary winnings earned by the driver.

driver.table_description: The table provides information about racing drivers.

columns.Team_ID: The unique identifier for the racing team.
columns.Driver_ID: The unique identifier for the racing driver.

team_driver.table_description: The table associates drivers with their respective racing teams.
